title: About
content:
Ni Nyampinga brings girls together across Rwanda – it is a movement of girls, for girls by girls.  

Ni Nyampinga means the beautiful girl, inside and out, who makes good decisions.  We believe **every** girl is ‘Ni Nampinga’ and that’s why our aim is to empower all girls across Rwanda to reach their full potential.

Ni Nyampinga  lives as a quarterly magazine, a radio program that is aired three times a week and a mobile website.
There are also lots of Ni Nyampinga clubs across Rwanda where girls come together to learn, share ideas and to spend time together.  

Are you in a Ni Nyampinga club?  If not what’s stopping you? why not begin one with your friends today?

**Ni Nyampinga – it’s you, it’s me, it’s all of us!**
